Name: Kaushik G
Title: Not a tourist attraction
Review: We had visited Lotus Pond during our sightseeing in Hyderabad but the place remains closed between 10 am to 4 PM. We did not find any lotus flowers blooming in the small lake and there was nothing much to see or do here.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: peaceful place
Review: Lotus Pond is a peaceful place. Much quite to feel relaxation. garden and lake is there, enough care is taken by authorities to take rest at regular interval.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: A Hidden gem
Review: Even though the pond is not very clean the garden is not visited by many and so you can have a nice leisurely stroll enjoying the birds chirping and greenery all around. There are benches at regular intervals where you can sit and read a book in peace. A small garden but nevertheless a hidden gem.

Name: TE K
Title: Joy
Review: I visited this place with my friends. The view of this hotel is very beautiful. The pond is clear no chaos in the pond. The main attraction of this place is the lake.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: amazing
Review: Its known for the surroundings and calmness.In the midst of the city but its decently maintained and good to go here at sun rise

Name: Daniel T
Title: Decent water-body to spend time at
Review: Its famous for its quite surroundings. There is no chaos around this pond, this makes the place quite & a good choice for anyone wanting to spend time in solitude.

Name: bhratmodi500
Title: Good oriental choices
Review: This restaurant is nice and very elegant ... love the interior but the main attraction is the choices of food ..ahh and the tast was also really good ...love this place

Name: Vikranth R
Title: good view
Review: Peaceful area where we can refresh our mind by viewing the climate over their, and visiting with friends may create more fun.

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Nice pond
Review: Very nice pond available in the hyderabad. we were passing by this place and we enjoyed the good time here.

Name: Durga Vara Pras... N
Title: Nice Park
Review: It is nice park in Jubilee Hills area which is covered with lush greenery in Rainy season. Always peaceful to visit this place.

Name: aviditor
Title: Nice Ambience
Review: Small but good place to hangout and for walking. Quiet. Nice Ambience. Don't miss out the triangle shape house.

Name: rambha b
Title: Recreational place in the center of the city
Review: The lotus pond is located in the centre of a park in the Banjara hills. The park is very green and the different color of lotus within the pond is very beautiful. Visiting this place gives a rejuvenating experience. It's a nice place to visit during the morning or evening for recreational purposes.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Relax and meditate
Review: Though called Lotus pond there aren't any lotus however the place is green, calm, peaceful and good for morning walk to inhale fresh air.

Name: Subrahmanyam G
Title: Nice place to spend Sunrise and sunset
Review: You love this place and spend time here. It is in the middle of concrete jungle and you feel the peace in sunrise and sunset time. The only bad thing is park will open 6pm

Name: vipul6112
Title: Camera is not allowed
Review: Nice calm place for morning walk. Open 6-10 in morning and few hours in evening. You won't find any lotus. :D. Less crowded. You can relax meditate..Although it is clean..pond needs more maintenance and cleanliness.

Name: shamstaab
Title: Scenic beauty
Review: A beautiful garden with pond as the main attraction. A very well maintained place with greenery all around & fresh air. But only open for few hours morning & evening.

Name: MR_F00DIE
Title: Paradise in Hyderabad
Review: An ideal place for a stroll early morning or in the evenings. Very serene. Its a pity they dont allow photography (for reasons best known to them!!)

Name: Yasserimran
Title: Picturesque lake in Banjara hills
Review: You will be pleasantly surprised to spot a beautiful lake preserved at its natural best; with walk way around it!  Best time to visit is morning!  2-3 rounds around it will give you a fresh start to the day... Professional cameras and plastic bags are not allowed for environmental reasons..

Name: Rajib Ghosh
Title: Not A Tourist Destination
Review: Lotuses neither grow in this pond not it is shaped like one. Its a misnomer. Nestled in area between Banjara Hills and Jubilee Hills, the Lotus pond is a water body surrounded by residential and commercial buildings.The pond itself is fenced with wire and does not allow stepping in and resting ones feet in the cold water. Being surrounded by political big-wigs and commercial offices, the narrow road around the lake is a traffic circus that is best avoided by one and all.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Excellent Greenery and Must visit for Photographer
Review: The shimmering pond is filled with fish.The self sustaining ecosystem plays hosts to a variety of species of birds near the lake.The undulating and sometimes uneven track makes for a grueling work-out for early morning joggers.Photographers must visit this wonderful place.

Name: mayuriams
Title: LOTUS POND was become other TANKBUND
Review: LOTUS POND was become other tank bund , water was not good and full flys , its located her to hitech cith

Name: Rajesh k
Title: Beauty of Mother Nature within the heart of the city
Review: Lotus pond is a beautiful park located in Banjara hills.  This is a park with a pond in the middle of the park.  The pond is full of fishes and has other aquatic creatures like crabs, tortoises and molluscs.  The entire park is very beautifully landscaped and has flowering plants.  Several beautiful birds are spotted near the pond, making it an awesome place for photography.  Overall, the pond is a very nice place to enjoy cool breeze during a morning or evening walk.

Name: aldinanthonyambosta
Title: Needs Maintenance
Review: It is a beautiful location. Unfortunately of late it is not maintained well and is gradually turning into a dump yard and a joint where individuals get to see loads of puppy love.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Good park with pond
Review: Lotus Pond is a park with lake in MLA colony. The pond has fishes, crab and tortoises. It is said good place for walk and sunset view.

Name: Erum M
Title: Beautiful place
Review: I like the hotelNeat and clean With good food awesome place amazing staff good welcomeManager is too good and friendly Near by lotus park amazing place for walk Homely environment

Name: SunilTiwari1987
Title: Average place
Review: There is nothing much to see and the water level is low.But the park is good.Here one can spend quality time with his or her partner.

Name: EmmanuelMurray
Title: Lovely Place
Review: The Lotus Pond is a lovely place to just stroll around in the evenings. Lots of street food is available to quench your appetite. Working at a place nearby, my choice is to have andhra meal with chicken curry at a mobile stall. Very tasty & economical.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: scary
Review: I've been to this park a couple of times. the last time i went here, i saw a snake right in the middle of the track and that was the last time i went there.

Name: Anurag V
Title: Pond with a lotus view
Review: the place looks very beautiful with lotus flower.The place is nice for a family trip and is having a great view at sunset.

Name: DavAnn M
Title: Best Chinese food!
Review: So we had always gone to a different place but after trying Lotus Pond, we only go here!  The chicken is always perfect and tender, never rubbery, tough or overcooked like other places that make it ahead of time.  Good prices and a vast menu.  Also very good at carry out!

Name: Sachin Kanna
Title: Not Bad
Review: Okay type place. Water level is low. Park is a bit good. Visited for office purpose. Overall average place to see.

Name: Wasim B
Title: I live near by
Review: I live in the same area as this pond I have grown along with it.. The plants and flowers give you soothing and calm feeling but sadly the water crisis has left the pond dry... It wad an oasis in the middle of a concrete jungle but sadly now it has very sad feeling too it well the hope has not turned to despair yet hopefully it rains hard this season and LOTUS Pond can restore it's old glory never the less still a calm place in the midst of all the noise and pollution... Have a visit

Name: Suresh R
Title: Good place to Relax and watching nature like Flowers,Fishes and trees
Review: my home is nearest to this park ...we will visit once in a monthand here Fishes are Awesome to watch andhere some of the Animals are their  Fishes,Crabs,Ducks,Snakes and crane birds

Name: Nainakhan1302
Title: I liked it!!
Review: I always to go this pond with my friends. Its a lovely place. Quite and calm. Can spend quality time with your partner.

Name: KriChaRed
Title: A tiny pond hidden in midst of concrete jungle
Review: This is a tiny lake hidden deep inside a residential colony. Well, not so deep that you would get lost finding it It is easily accessible. A good place when you would like spend some time beside a water body without much of travel.Beware, you make really close contact with the floral and fauna around

Name: outside o
Title: Nice spot if you're in the area, to me it is not a destination.
Review: Nice spot to relax and walk around the pond.  Security guards keeping food, drinks, cameras, and ballyhoo outside the gates.  This place is only open in the wee hours (It think) and between 4-6 pm.  I am constantly frustrated by the closed hours of public parks.  You can walk around the pond in about 15-20 minutes, we usually stretch it to about 45 by letting our toddler toddle, and stopping to check out the turtles/fish/crabs which are easily seen en mass from the path directly opposite the main gait.  There is also a small wooded section off to the left of the main path with several covered pavilions.  We wandered through once or twice and it was mostly teenage boys carving their names into tree trunks while taking turns looking out for the guides and a couple of couples getting frisky in the shadows.  Looked like the pavilions  would be good for some morning exercises or yoga.  We never felt the least bit threatened in this area, but it is somewhat removed from the main trail and most of the people.  Overall, I visit this park once or twice a week due to proximity, would visit it more if it were open during the day.  Also, any birders, there is usually anywhere from 4-10 species of wading and water birds visible in the pond.

Name: occlusion_vikas
Title: nothing much to talk about
Review: this place is not to standards of what the G.H.M.C talks about but much cleaner than other parks in the city . not very easily reached unless u have ur own transport , hardly find lotus there but a nice place to have a morning walk though. cannot totally blame the authorities but the park users too they lack basic civic sense .

Name: rajah369
Title: Small Oasis in middle of the City
Review: Kids will love the place watch birds , fish and quiet place to relax , walk and kill some time. do not go after dark too many masquitos.

Name: Rach R
Title: Unwind...
Review: This place is good to spend time wit friends and family, it is also good for relaxing or maybe even your morning and evening walks ! It is also maintained very well, since I went in the evening I am aware it opens a 4 pm, and the guards are very particular about the rules !

Name: Sachin Jha
Title: Spend Evening with kids.
Review: We go to the pond once in a while on weekends. Pond has fishes and well maintained pathway around it. Pathway looks natural from distance even though it is made of artificial raw materials. Pond has surrounding bushes and trees which has lot of birds including ducks. Main attraction of pond are fishes and tortoises in it which can be seen with naked eyes as they come on water surface. Fishes which live school make appear number of fishes at one place. Best time to visit late afternoon. Park closes early evening for entrance.

Name: Renji Varghese T
Title: Nice atmosphere
Review: Nice place if your soul needs some fresh air and want to just keep out yourself from the busy city . Nice place to take a walk with your family.

Name: vksariyu
Title: Good place to visit once
Review: Very nice and clean place to visit once. Have a nice walk through the lane beside the pond.Kids will enjoy this place.

Name: anindras
Title: Worth visit once
Review: - There is some greenery there in the middle of the city.- Also some water.- Nothing else.- If you live nearby, then you may visit there ofter to spend some time. Otherwise it's worth just 1 visit.

Name: vkmsivaprasad
Title: visit lotus pond
Review: It is near to my office. Place maintenance is good and entry also free. Daily so many members will come to walk and enjoy the fresh air.

Name: SRINIWAAS S
Title: The spot usually used to attract nature lovers, bird watchers, photographers and morning walkers
Review: The pond is spread over around 10-12 acres and is encircled by lush green trees, colourful gardens and a beautiful 1-1/5 km concrete pathway with breaks in between of green patches and muddy ones too.

Name: Harshith358
Title: Nice place to spend some time in peace
Review: A good place to find some peace. This place is less popular that other places in the city. As a result it has less crowd. The location of this pond is also a surprise.

Name: abMximb63
Title: Nature's gift
Review: Its a lovely place to be. you can spend your evening and you will fell like you are in heaven. Such is the calmness over there.

Name: Rajesh1965
Title: Peaceful Place !
Review: + A great place for a evening walk.   An oasis in the heart of Jubilee Hills.- There is an entry fee.- Sometimes they do not allow cameras.

Name: slayer_prashanth
Title: A cool pond inside a colony
Review: A very nice and calm place inside a posh area like jubliee hills. The environment there calms a tensed mind. A really cool spot for a hangout with friends, kids and parents.

Name: SagarRahurkar
Title: Hidden gem in the city of Hyderabad
Review: Nice place for a walk or a quite date. Can not believe that such a place exists in the busy city. Major plus point is ample parking place near and one of the most clean public places in India.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Good place for an evening walk
Review: Its a nice peaceful place for a walk in the evenings. Its a well maintained garden that attracts many   people both young and old.

Name: MARGDARSHI
Title: A Sudden Beauty Find In a Dense City
Review: We were just going past the Jubillee hills & i suddenly remembered visiting a beauty spot here a long time back.So decided to take my family to a round of this beautiful oasis amidst the hustle bustle of Hyderabad.The name is a misnomer as it is a small park with a path of about a km with a lovely lotus pond inside it.There are also some lovely species of birds like pied kingfisher,white wagtail,sun birds & little egret etc.This place we found as a little treasure but it is subject to limited viewing times of 6 to 10 am & 4 to 8 pm in the evening.It is better go early as the lighting is not good & the area is quite dark.We also left regretfully after spending only a little time, with the approaching darkness with the hope of coming back again.Worth a visit.

Name: Ravi K
Title: Peace full for walking
Review: this is a natural pond there is a limited time for visiting. morning and evening walkers they can take their health walk. in this pond fises are very size but here no permission for fishing

Name: Karan K
Title: An Escape into the Calm
Review: not quite an easy place to find, but once there, rest assured that you wouldnt come out of it any time soon, its got an amazing jogging track which runs around a beautiful lotus filled pond- hence the name - its got ups and downs and stairs and stretches, over all a very pleasing experience, just make sure u go in broad say light, cause once the sun goes down, its all dark here..likes - very natural, a rare view in the heart of the city, a photogenic locationdislikes - no proper lighting in and around the pond in the evening times, claimed to be a bit spooky at night,,,

Name: pawanbindal
Title: Best place in hyderabad
Review: Easily the best place in hyderabad. Not crowded. Check the timings, only evening and mornings. A nice lake with some good birds to see.

Name: kransg
Title: Nice place for a short walk
Review: This place is well maintained and good for a short walk. opened for few hours, typically early mornings and evenings...quite and peaceful. photography encouraged here ðŸ˜Š. Check timings before going to this place.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: its like a nature place
Review: I This place is for couples  i have gone wit my friend on correct timings inside no crowd at evening  v r  going 2 the hut its beautiful place 2 take photos & wooden beam chairs to sit   entirely surroundings full of trees  in middle the view of water lotus pond  at corner v see huge bunch of  fishes, very rare small tortoise at last v saw 3 ducks  its very nice if u go near they come with u & beat with mouth be careful with whatever .

Name: gayathrimoksha
Title: Wonderful Place
Review: I could never forget this place!! The only park in Hyd where you can see greenery and cleanliness.It's not much crowdy.. very peaceful and strict timings!

Name: diksha k
Title: Refreshing
Review: Very clean and well maintained place. Good to go for morning or evening strolls. However I didn't see a single lotus there yet I liked the place a lot. It's good to spend some time close to nature.

Name: m k B
Title: LOTUS POND
Review: Lotus Pond is a small water body Inside MLA Colony, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, India. The pond is surrounded by lush green flora and a 1.2 kilometer path.Lotus Pond is home to more than 20 species of birds. A few of them are Pied Kingfisher, White Wagtail, Common Moorhen, Little Grebe, sunbirds, Common Coot, and Little Egret.The pond is maintained by the Municipal Corporation of Hyderabad(MCH).The Lotus Pond was conceived to be an Eco-conservation project bringing natural elements into the concept of the project without disturbing the ecosystem and conserving the natural rocks and pond.

Name: Vishal J
Title: Peaceful
Review: Nice peaceful and clean place.....Good place for having a walk with your partnerThey should extend the evening timing a bit more....

Name: dranirbandasgupta665
Title: Nice to visit
Review: Nice to visit in the evening and great place to experience. Depending on your interest and nature attachment, but it is a good place to visit in reality.

Name: vibha123
Title: Most serene place in Hyderabad
Review: This place is probably the most serene place in Hyderabad. And very well maintained too. Only issue is the timings at this place. It is closed in the afternoons. Also check out the small fish in the pond... :)i couldnt believe i was in hyderabad for a long time looking at the beautiful site infront of us...we were a group of friends and after a good lunch we decided to visit lotus pond as we had heard a lot about fishes and the place as such from one of our friends who used to work close to this place.i was watching swans, turtoise, fishes in water and i could see them till it got evening  from afternoon....such a beautiful place ....site is out of the world...breath taking views and feeling is just awesome that we are not in hyderabad....A must visit place.

Name: Joseph
Title: Serene
Review: This place is probably the most serene place in Hyderabad. And very well maintained too. Only issue is the timings at this place. It is closed in the afternoons. Also check out the small fish in the pond... :)

Name: Gamya T
Title: Peaceful place for a pleasant walk
Review: What to expect: 1. Serene location. 2. Walkway around a pool 3. If you get unlucky, you might see a snake or two :(But overall experience is good.

Name: hiteshgoldeneye
Title: Not well maintained - waste of time
Review: Went there one evening after reading some good reviews in TripAdvisor however was disappointed to find that the site is nothing but another wasted opportunity. The pond is not well maintained, despite there being fishes in it, they are hardly visible since the water is probably dirty. There is no fencing on the pond and can be risky if you go with a child.

Name: praveenkamath
Title: Beautiful
Review: Had been there for photography, a lovely place amidst all the chaos of the city. To relax, to refresh and to click.Best part was that the ducks walk with you on thw walkway :)

Name: Chandresh P
Title: Lovely place
Review: Away from the rumble and bumble of the city. We could see lot of fish(all sizes), a very colorful small bird, one turtle and two tortoises! Turtle was a colorful one. Would like to go again. Recommended for a visit! Best to visit early morning as I am told. I was there around 7 am. Unlike KBR park and many other parks, this is a zero fee excellent place! You have to be careful with children though as the place does not have boundary for the pond at several places. There was a thela(pushcart) 100 meters away from entrance that had idlis and puri-sabji on the menu. Absolutely tasty and highly recommended as well!

Name: DileepMalipeddi
Title: One touch of nature :)
Review: Discovered it very lately :( . Well i have visited this place in the early morning around 6.15AM or so , The first thing that attracted me as soon as i enter this place is the cuckoo sound that i can hear and echos of it over the place . The place is not crowdy , hardly i can find 4 to 5 people during that time who came over there  for a morning walk , and i can see the relief and refreshment on their face from this busy life and this roaring city of traffic . Never knew that such place can even exist in the middle of city . The place is so beautiful that one can lost in the beauty of nature for a while , The pond is full of fishes and you can sit idle starring at them . The park is very well maintained and full of greenery . I can not see any lotuses though it was named as lotus pond :p may be i have expected them in wrong season :) . Worth visiting .If you are a deep thinker and need some time relax and

Name: khanjan Antani
Title: Lovely place..
Review: You may not fill that you are in the middle of the city. LOVELY PLACE to hang around. Good for joggers and walkers (Lovers too..Please read with spirit) Nature is very close to you. But very stringent timing of the garden. 6 am to 9 am and 3pm to 6 pm. If you are alone then you must be prepare to argu with guard to carry camera. WORTH PLACE FOR PHOTOGRAPHY...

Name: SirishaAchanta
Title: Paradise in midst of chaos of a city!
Review: We discovered it too late is all I repent.Its the best maintained park in Hyderabad and most well-kept. Its beautiful and picturesque is an understatement. you feel that it isnt a part of Hyderabad at all. Once you are inside the park, its an instant cheap vacation while staying within the city itself. Its an instant stress buster for me.

Name: casperkamal
Title: Definitely be here...to discover yourself
Review: You will be surprised to see that such a place exists in the heart of the city. A walk here will push all the stress out and help you gain inner piece. Be here definitely once at least if you live in hyderabad but keep in mind the timings it is open only in the early mornings till 8 and in the evenings from 4.30 p.m to 6.30 p.m. Your literally chased after that :)The monumental(fun intended) jagan's house is just facing this pond.

Name: Vedaant R
Title: Not maintained well
Review: Lotus Pond - Hyderabad Lake places.Lotus Pond is a modest water body located on Banjara Hills in Hyderabad. The pond is enclosed by luxuriant green flora; ...The pond is maintained by the Municipal Corporation of Hyderabad(MCH). The Lotus Pond was conceived to be an Eco-conservation project bringing natural ... But it like other goverment place which not maintained well.
